titleStmt.title: Mr. Fuller's appeal to both Houses of Parliament, with letters relating to Sir John Fenwick and himself by William Fuller ...
Appeal to both houses of Parliament
titleStmt.author: Fuller, William, 1670-1717?

notesStmt.note: Sir John Fenwick was an adherent of James II, of England, and one of the conspirators against King William.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
